wikipedia_page.main: Michael John Mackey Erritt, CB (15 February 1931, Belfast - 3 October 2002, Lindfield, Sussex) was the Deputy Director of the British Government Statistical Service.

response: *3 October – John Erritt, Deputy Director of the British Government Statistical Service (born 1931).
*15 February – John Erritt, Deputy Director of the British Government Statistical Service (died 2002).
